page.title: 14LEISURE 2
page.content: IN THE VILLAGES ARE THRE LICENSED RESTURANTS.ON THE OLD ORIGINAL A38 IS GISSONS. THIS IS A MOCK TUDOR BUILDING WHERE CUSTOMERS MAY BE SERVED WITH MEALS THAT ARE SUPERIOR TO THOSE SERVED IN A PUBLIC HOUSE. NEXT TO THIS THE KENNFORD MERCURY MOTEL BUILT AT THE TIME OF THE LAST MAJOR ROAD BUILDING. THIS TENDS TO CATER FOR THE TOURIST WHO USES IT TO BREAK HIS JOURNEY.AT THE BASE OF HALDON HILL IS THE HALDON THATCH RESTAURANT WHICH ATTRACTS CUSTOMERS FROM EXETER WHO WANT AN EVENING OUT OF THE CITY.
